me lokayehi samahara pudgalayekme kusal yayi me akusal yayi meya warada sahithaya, meya warada rahithaya, meya sewanaya kala yuthuya, meya sewanaya nokala yuthuya, meya lamakaya meya uthumya, me kusal akusal walata samana dharmayo yayi athi satiyen nodani da, ee pudgalaya pasu kalakadi uthum wu dharmaya asa da nuwanin menehi kere da dharmayata anuwa pilipadi da, ee pudgalaya asimata da, nuwanin menehi kirimata da, dharmayata anuwa pilipadimata da pamina me kusal yayi me akusal yayi athi satiyen danagani, meya warada sahithaya, meya warada rahithaya, meya sewanaya kala yuthuya, meya sewanaya nokala yuthuya, meya lamakaya, meya uthumya, meya kusal akusal dekata samanaya kiya athi satiyen danagani.

jana injineru widyawe mahimayen jana parikshana sidu karana aayathanayaka alsayimar rogayata osu sewimata wehesena wil athulu pirisa me parikshana sandaha yoda ganne chimpansinwa ya.san fransisko hi pihiti me aayathanaye himikaru wilwa meheyawanne parikshana sarthaka kara ganimata pamani.wil kruthrimawa nipayu retrowayirasaya chimpansin wetha ennath karanu labayi.ek chimpansi mathawakata me ennatha laba dena athara aya wishesha buddhimathbhawayak pennum karayi.mandayath me ennatha mangin chimpansita minsun se kriyakirimata haki buddhiya laba dena bawini.pera ki chimpansi mathawa hora rahase pataweku bihi karana athara thama patawata anathurak we yayi nithara biyen pasu wana aya dineka thama kuduwa binda gena eliyata pamina ek ayekuwa sapa kayi.me samanga wil ge paryeshana waha ma nawathannath chimpansin mara damannath ana kere.chimpansi patawa wil ge bharayata path wanne ehi prathipalayak washayeni.
